title: Incendie dans une raffinerie de pétrole russe après une attaque de drones ukrainienne-gouverneur
cleaned_sentences: Moscow, March 16 (Reuters) - A drone attack Ukrainians targeted two oil refineries in the region of Samara, said the governor of the region on Saturday, adding That a fire had declared itself in one of the infrastructure.
Dmitry Azarov said in a statement published on Telegram that the Syzran refinery was on fire, but that a Attack on the Novokoubychev refinery had been thwarted.
He added that the employees of the two factories had been evacuated and that there were no victims.
Images published online, which could not be verified, showed what seemed to be an important fire in the Syzran refinery, while emergency services were at work on site.
In recent weeks, Ukraine has targeted infrastructure Russian oils, notably striking refineries in West Russia.
(Reuters report, written by Felix Light; French version Camille Raynaud)
